dataIdInfo.idAbs: The File to SDE Workspace tool extends the Create SDE Workspace tool. It facilitates moving all data from a file geodatabase to an enterprise (SDE) geodatabase. Using the name of the file geodatabase to name the new enterprise geodatabase, it performs all the funtions in the Create SDE Workspace tool. Using the data owner connection, it finishes by copying all data from the file to the enterprise geodatabase.

tool.name: FileToSdeTool

param.name: fileGdb
param.dialogReference: Please sepcify the file geodatabase data source. All data residing in this geodatabase will be copied to a new enterprise geodatabase with the same name on the server instance specified below.

param.name: instance
param.dialogReference:
On what machine intance does the database management system reside?

This defaults to the local machine name since many times this script is used for setting up a database on a test or demonstration machine. However, if your database server resides on a different machine than where the script is being run, this will need to be changed accordingly.

param.name: dbms
param.dialogReference:
What database managment system is being used?

This defaults to Postgre SQL since this is the DBMS used to create the script.

param.name: suName
param.dialogReference:
What is the database management system superuser name?

This will autopopulate based on the DBMS selected above. Typically these defaults will work. In some instaces this may have to be changed.

param.name: suPswd
param.dialogReference: What is the database managment system superuser password?

param.name: ownerName
param.dialogReference:
What is the data owner's login name going to be?

If this user already exists, specify this existing user. If database authentication is supported and the user does not already exist, the user will be created.

param.name: ownerPswd
param.dialogReference:
What is the data owner's password going to be?

If the above specified data owner already exists, this will need to be the correct password. If the data owner does not already exist, this will set the password for the new user.

param.name: authFile
param.dialogReference:
What is the path to the keycodes file?

This defaults to the location where the file should be found. However, if the server is on a different machine, this may have to be specified in a different location.

tool.summary: The File to SDE Workspace tool extends the Create SDE Workspace tool. It facilitates moving all data from a file geodatabase to an enterprise (SDE) geodatabase. Using the name of the file geodatabase to name the new enterprise geodatabase, it performs all the funtions in the Create SDE Workspace tool. Using the data owner connection, it finishes by copying all data from the file to the enterprise geodatabase.
